RelatedSentence: A construction worker in Arlington was killed Monday afternoon after being hit by a piece of equipment , officials said .

An excavator being used at a construction site at Fourth Street and George Mason Drive tipped over and killed a man believed to be the operator , Capt. Tiffanye Wesley of the Arlington County Fire Department said .
Arlington police and a medical examiner were on the scene investigating the cause of the accident and awaiting staff from the Occupational Safety and Health Administration .
